docs.text:
Welcome to the Hack Spark!




RSVP


Join us in San Francisco on June 12th!




Get on Slack


Fill in and submit the form below to join this hackathon's 
Slack team
. Go 
here
 to find more information about Slack.



Fill out my 
online form
.

Learn Spark


New to Spark? Take the 
Spark Fundamentals
 course on 
Big Data University
.


Get your team


How are you getting your cut of the 
$10,000
 in prizes? Bring your team in! Get your folks to RSVP 
here
, then and go in Slack and chat with 
teambot
 to register your team. If you don't have a team, he'll help to find one!

docs.title: Get your team

docs.text:
Slack
 is an awesome platform for team communication and it's our tool of choice for this hackathon. All the communication will flow through Slack!


You have been sent an invitation for this hackathon's 
Slack team
. In case you haven't received it, please message us at 
 asking for help!


Once your team is formed, you should create a 
private group
 for discussions, file sharing and collaboration in general.


You can use Slack from your Web browser, but we strongly recommend that you the native apps:




Mac OS


Windows


iOS


Android
